name: Ludum Dare 46 Tree Sim
description:
Entry for the 46th Ludum Dare April 2020

Tree Sim -  A little tree growing toy

Can you grow a procedurally generated tree from a tiny seed?

Of course you can, all you need to do is water it and make sure the light and heat levels are suitable. You might need to give it some plant food if it grows really big as well.

I realise this only loosely fits the theme of "Keep it Alive" but I really wanted to explore the different kinds of tree generated hence it's very easy and there isn't a permanent fail state.

Be sure to name and take a picture of any nice looking trees you grow :)
